Name: Purry Furry Adventurry
About the game: Help Kat escape from her loving owner in this cute little endless runner! Watch out for traffic and friendly dogs as you jump, run and fight your way through the city! Unleash cute, hand drawn, 2D chaos around you as you hunt for snacks while jazzing along to original music! About the Developer Crabby Collabby is an indie studio created by two friends with the intention to battle perfectionism. Alone they often get stuck on perfecting all the small little details, but together they are an unstoppable force of crappy efficient art and design collaboration!
